channel.title: Can someone please code rules for me?
channel.description:
Server is run off of pimpscape, I would like a ::rules command coded for it please, I am admin of the server and the owner refuses to code this, but will add it if someone else codes it.
Rules are as follows:
1. Follow the rules.
2. No barraging unless an admin tells you it's allowed.
3. No C bow or mage bows allowed unless said so by admin.
4. Respect mods and admins. If they tell you to do something, do it.
5. Do not ask to be a mod or admin unless you have a good reason why you should be one.
6. No white or black pking, that includes any piece of white or black armor.
7. No luring, it's nooby.
8. No looting, it's noobier than luring.
9. No mass summoning.
10. No noclipping, this will result in instant ban. (Don't try it)
11. No sicking summoned npcs on people.
12. No attacking and running. (This does not include miss-clicks.)
13. No attacking new players. (Below level 100.)
14, No Massing unless said so by Teh-0wner.
15. No attacking anyone who is training.
16. No mass tele'ing. (Type ::mage.)
17. Do not attack the talking trolls!

@sonjichan wrote:

Because I spent the greater part of last year just leeching, so I’m making up for it, by helping others get their server running decently.

item.title: Can someone please code rules for me?
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

Your welcome. Please remember to change areas that say obvious things like YOURSERVERTITLEGOESHERE

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@YOURSERVERTITLEGOESHERE", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@red@READ ALL THE RULES!!", 8146); sendQuest("@blu@AND APPLY AND PRACTICE THEM!", 8147); sendQuest("Rule 1: No barraging unless admin approves", 8148); sendQuest("Rule 2: No cbow or mage bows unless admin approves", 8149); sendQuest("Rule 3: Respect mods and admins, and do what they say.", 8150); sendQuest("Rule 4: Do not ask for mod or adminship, unless good reason.", 8151); sendQuest("Rule 5: No pking in white or black armor", 8152); sendQuest("Rule 6: No luring, it's nooby!", 8153); sendQuest("Rule 7: No looting, it's noobier than luring.", 8154); sendQuest("Rule 8: No mass summoning.", 8155); sendQuest("Rule 9: No noclipping, this will result in instant ban. (Don't try it)", 8156); sendQuest("Rule 10: No sicking summoned npcs on people.", 8157); sendQuest("Rule 11: No attacking and running. (This does not include miss-clicks.)", 8158); sendQuest("Rule 12: No attacking new players. (Below level 100.)", 8159); sendQuest("Rule 13: No Massing unless said so by Teh-0wner.", 8160); sendQuest("Rule 14: No attacking anyone who is training. ", 8161); sendQuest("Rule 15: No mass tele'ing. (Type ::mage.) ", 8162); sendQuest("Rule 16: Do not attack the talking trolls!", 8163); sendQuest("---=== Thanks for playing ===---", 8164); sendQuest("Admins are: ADDADMINNAMESHERE", 8165); sendQuest("@blu@Mods are: ADDMODNAMESHERE", 8166); sendQuest("@blu@A CONTACT EMAIL OR MESSENGER", 8167); sendQuest("@dre@A WEBSITE", 8168); sendQuest("@dre@A quote for your server if you have one", 8169); sendQuest("@bla@Server name and version", 8170); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Read full topic

Server is run off of pimpscape, I would like a ::rules command coded for it please, I am admin of the server and the owner refuses to code this, but will add it if someone else codes it.

Rules are as follows:

  1. Follow the rules.

  2. No barraging unless an admin tells you it’s allowed.

  3. No C bow or mage bows allowed unless said so by admin.

  4. Respect mods and admins. If they tell you to do something, do it.

  1. No attacking anyone who is training.
